member.name: ENUMTEXTMETRICA
member.summary: The ENUMTEXTMETRIC structure contains information about a physical font.

member.name: ENUMTEXTMETRICA.etmNewTextMetricEx
member.summary: A structure, containing information about a physical font.

member.name: ENUMTEXTMETRICA.etmAxesList
member.summary: An structure, containing information about the axes for the font. This is only used for multiple master fonts.
